column4: Can anyone tell me how to run an application (actually a Java .jar file) on my machine's :0 display from SSH?
I mean do I use the export command on a separate line, or as part of the java -jar line?\
I get "Can't connect to X11 window server using ':0' as the value of the DISPLAY variable."
the same user as the person who is logged in
I'm not, but I disabled "nolisten tcp" for X
if you are not the same user, I don't think it works. I know very little about x
I'll try as the same user
in the past without doing anything I have run stuff by setting DISPLAY as the same user who was logged in
the same user can't connect to :0 either
I don't know the answer then.
It works when I try to run firefox
